name: The Last Light (slosumo, AudioJim)
description:
You are The Keeper of The Light. The last light in the Universe. Without The Light, The Universe will be gone.

As The Keeper you can harness the power of The Light to power turrets which will fend off fanatical orbs trying to end the Universe by dimming the light.

Note: The game was made in 2 days, so balancing might be a bit off, and some features are very basic (i.e. upgrade system). But it can still give you an enjoyable experience :)
** The game currently does NOT have a save system - if you refresh the browser any progress will be lost

Features:- When the light starts dimming out you gain massive attack boosts
- Never-ending waves of enemies
- Losing is not the end, but only a way to become more powerful

Controls
- Mouse is needed only, hotkeys will be added ASAP
